name: Castle of Dark Illusions (Anime)
text: Face-down Defense Position monsters you control can be switched to face-up Attack Position when attacked. During your Main Phase, you can change face-up monsters you control to face-down Defense Position, except this card. You can only use these effects as long as this card is face-up on the field. If this card leaves the field, flip all monsters you control face-up, also, if it was destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy all monsters you control.
